name: cloudbeaver
tagline: A self-hosted web database manager for exploring and editing data
description: CloudBeaver is a lightweight self-hosted cloud database manager built by the DBeaver team. It offers an intuitive web UI for viewing, editing, and managing databases, including PostgreSQL, MySQL, and Oracle.

features.title: Database Manager
features.description: Web-based database management tool. Browser access

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Built by trusted DBeaver developers. Proven expertise

features.title: Rich Text Editor
features.description: Write and execute SQL queries. Powerful functionality

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: Minimal resource usage for efficient operation. Fast performance

features.title: Self-Hosted
features.description: Keep database access on your infrastructure. Security control
